title: Doug Collins (politician)
added: Hours after Supreme Court Justice [[Ruth Bader-Ginsburg]] died in September 2020, Collins wrote on [[Twitter]]: "RIP to the more than 30 million innocent babies that have been murdered during the decades that Ruth Bader Ginsburg defended pro-abortion laws. With @realDonaldTrump nominating a replacement that values human life, generations of unborn children have a chance to live."<ref>https://twitter.com/CollinsforGA/status/1307129730961936386</ref> Collins received several tweets condemning his remarks in response.<ref>https://www.rawstory.com/2020/09/you-are-garbage-goper-doug-collins-hammered-for-ugly-tweet-ing-ruth-bader-ginsburg/</ref>
